website_summaries.verdict: A box of 3 varieties – smoked sockeye, wild smoked coho and wild smoked pink salmon.
pros: Comes with 3 fillets and makes a great hostess gift
Noted as moist, tender, and flavorful with an authentic, fresh taste
cons: Higher price, but most say it’s worth it
A few buyers note an unappetizing smell and oily texture

customer_reviews.title: SeaBear Smoked Salmon Trio.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best smoked salmon products ever. It is not the dry kind, but rather has a bit of juice. I like both kinds. It was so fresh and had a great taste. It didn't take me to long to devour it. I spaced the three packages over two months. Each package was divided in half, two morning breakfasts with crackers. Until opening, it does not need to be refrigerated. It came in a foam box with dry ice and was very cold when it arrived. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying a variety of Amazon provided salmon. My goal is to know what to send as Christmas gifts to loved ones. This product is excellent and I plan to make this my annual gift to friends and family. Great taste and texture and delivery. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: SEABEAR SMOKED SALMON
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY THE BEST SMOKED SALMON........THIS IS MY 2ND PURCHASE (BOUGHT THE FIRST TRIO AT THE SEABEAR STORE IN ANECORTES, WA.) PERFECT WITH A DOLUP OF CREAM CHEESE ON A CRACKER......OR JUST EAT AS IS. KEEPS WELL AND TASTES GREAT FOR A LONG, LONG TIME. HIGHLY RECOMMEND IF YOU LOVE SMOKED SALMON!!
customer_reviews.author: Margie D

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this especially for gift-giving
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for friends who appreciate tasty, unusual food items. I would've awarded five stars except that the box was cardboard rather than wood. Still, the variety of salmon and the detailed information on the package made for a well appreciated Christmas gift. I recommend this especially for gift-giving.
customer_reviews.author: Weezer

customer_reviews.title: SPOILED!!
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited when this was delivered. We opened it right before guests were due to arrive. It smelled so awful we had to throw it away. Despite saying No Refrigeration Necessary, clearly it needed something. The lingering smell was atrocious. Lesson learned. :(
customer_reviews.author: Judith L.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious smoked fish
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the trio of sockeye, pink, and king salmon. The smoke flavor was subtle but good. Ordering this 3-pack was a great deal for smoked salmon. I was going to make dip with the king salmon, but it was so rich and delicious that I didn't want to adulterate its flavor with cream cheese. These are great for appetizers, and would be wonderful in a salad or in pasta. The skin is also edible, or you can also remove it when you plate the salmon.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I can't recommend ths. I find it very bitter and unappetizing. It's sitting in liquid in the package which I don 't like either. It's kinda slimy. Yich.
customer_reviews.author: RPCV 2002

customer_reviews.title: Yum !!!
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and myself originate from the great state of Washington and grew up on salmon, but do to military commitment have lived in the south for well over 30 years. However, loved ones back home know how much we love salmon, and have raised are children on the same, and ever Christmas we great a resupply of SeaBear Smoke Salmon and it is defiantly worth the wait. Alright my do a few more orders throughout the year to keep supplied, to include care packages overseas... Thanks Seabear...
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: Well-balanced, good flavor, excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: Love this salmon, and this set makes a great gift. I bought several of these so that when we were on a trip, we could bring something from home as a gift. These are very nicely packaged, you can give the whole trio or break it up into the 3 individual boxes. Salmon taste is excellent, and it is not too oily and not too raw tasting, so I think they have struck a good balance, very similar to how I smoke my own.
customer_reviews.author: Rainforest Defender

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wow so glad I found this. Delicious and exactly what be been searching for.
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Salmon has horrible smell and no flavor...
customer_reviews.text: Salmon was packed in a smelly liquid and the fish itself lacked flavor. Nobody liked the salmon at the party..and the horrible fishy smell lingered in my kitchen for days.....if the company could figure out another way to package the salmon without the smelly liquid it might have been better
customer_reviews.author: D Dodge

customer_reviews.title: Packaged in metallic pouches
customer_reviews.text: It had little bit of packaging flavor effect, similar to how tuna gets can flavor. The salmon was okay. Neat to have wild caught salmon. Some of these reviews must be sponsored. Very canned tuna-ish
customer_reviews.author: jus

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it was good
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it was good...not great, but it's not the salmon with the meaty, flaky "bite"; it's a little "wet" and somewhat soft. Like the tuna pouches in the supermarket that are packed in water. I mixed it in cream cheese for a yummy bagel spread and also mixed some in scrambled eggs...gave my food a nice smoky flavor. Might buy again, but would try others first.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Berman

customer_reviews.title: Watery, tough.
customer_reviews.text: Watery, tough even smelled bad. Worse smoked salmon I’ve ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Marie D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and moist and oh so yummo!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Flaked nicely with a fork, deliciously moist and sooooo good on a cracker. Great addition to cheese plate or for appetizer. Love that it's high in omega 3s and switches up salmon from baked or broiled.
customer_reviews.author: catherine  m

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I have not eaten all 3 yet, but the pink salmon was very good (there is also 1 Sockeye or Red Salmon and 1 Coho or Silver Salmon - I'm sure the others will be very good too. No preservatives, no dye, caught and processed in the Pacific Northwest USA - not China. And you don't have to refrigerate them until after they are opened.
customer_reviews.author: AuntyB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful salmon treat and Pacific Northwest memory
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase of this item as a treat at the holidays. (We don't get smoked salmon of this quality in the Midwest to my knowledge.) Wonderful salmon trio sampler, quick shipping and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: K Buyer

customer_reviews.title: I love smoked salmon and serve it often for guests
customer_reviews.text: For the price you might as well find some smoked salmon in your grocery store and end up with three or four times as much. I love smoked salmon and serve it often for guests, but this was absolutely nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Mama

customer_reviews.title: ***Overrated!*** so far.
customer_reviews.text: This product was highly recommended by independent reviewers. I a few concern about this product. Packaging seems overkill for me. I guessed the only thing sustainable about it is the way this was fished out. Individual packaging for each salmon inside each box goes against sustainable practices. Now for the actual product. Overcooked! Overcooked! Overcooked! All three of the salmon pieces. I shared the salmon with 5 other people without commenting on it and they have similar critic. Overcooked! I'm disappointed with this product so far. I thought the $8 smoked salmon from Raley's or Safeway was better. both 1 more set this product to give it another chance. I hope it gets better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: It was gifts for friends, They liked it very much. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Fairly great product
customer_reviews.text: Deliscous pricey but good and make sure to refrigerate its good cold
customer_reviews.author: kenneth korus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Delicious - rather expensive for my income but will probably purchase again when I have another craving for it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kowal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This salmon is delicious and is always a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great Present
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves salmon on crackers, so I decided to send this to him for his birthday based on the good reviews. He was very excited when he received it in the mail. Then, my awesome dad saved the salmon until we went to visit 2 months later! Very tender, flavorful and delicious. We had a good time comparing the three types of salmon and reading about the differences. I don't like gifting the same thing over and over, but this will be a backup if I run out of gift ideas. Thank you for this excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Nom nom!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boss. He has only had one of them so far and said it was delicious. I tried a teeny bite and I also thought it was delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Medusa333

customer_reviews.title: Great but just to much salt and cost seems high
customer_reviews.text: Great but just to much salt and cost seems high. I guess u get what u pay for, I could eat this every day. If u need to restrict salt, watch out with any processed food.
customer_reviews.author: The Don

customer_reviews.title: Nice packaging  says too salty
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gift they said it's was too salty i was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: benjamin batie

customer_reviews.title: they live near the ocean and couldnt be happier. told me tasted fresh
customer_reviews.text: sent this to my family for thanksgiving. they live near the ocean and couldnt be happier. told me tasted fresh :-)
customer_reviews.author: danny lay

customer_reviews.title: Always a Winner
customer_reviews.text: Love it! And my friends love it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Good But A Little Too Dry...
customer_reviews.text: ...for my taste. I'm switching to SeaBear Ready-to-Eat Pink Salmon, 3.5 Ounce Unit and am assuming it won't be as dry as smoked. I want to stick with fresh caught wild since the supermarket salmon around here is all Atlantic (farmed).
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sean

customer_reviews.title: This product is delicious. We bought one as a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is delicious. We bought one as a Christmas gift and one for ourselves, which we have been enjoying very much.
customer_reviews.author: dbahr

customer_reviews.title: Deliciously Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to six people as a Christmas present and although one arrived late, but still before Christmas, everyone enjoyed it and asked for a repeat gift for next year. They said the selection was perfect and the salmon was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Geren

customer_reviews.title: Great as a gift.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time and was exactly what I needed to complete a gift basket for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best product and supplier
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best smoked salmon we've ever tasted. Quality is consistent, over many years. This supplier is new but service and delivery were excellent. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Joe H.

customer_reviews.title: SeaBear Smoked Salmon
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually very good. The chowder mix was given to us as a gift and it was so good, we decided to try the trio 18-Ounce Box. Good smoke taste without being harsh or overbearing. Would defiantly recommend and also would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Burchett

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother who loves salmon. She appreciated taste testing and comparing the three varieties. She served it for guests and said she was pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: L.Christine

customer_reviews.title: SeaBear has not disappointed us yet
customer_reviews.text: Delish. SeaBear has not disappointed us yet. Great smoked salmon. (If you are expecting lox it's not lox, buy lox).
customer_reviews.author: Peter C

customer_reviews.title: Great Salmon!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this product for a friend and he loves it. This is my second purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gay l Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: So happy with the product. It is great and the flavor is wonderful. Surpassed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Janis R Frederick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift and Great Tasting
customer_reviews.text: I originally received one of these gift packs for a gift. The salmon is absolutely delicious and very well packed. This past Christmas I purchased a 3 pack to give as gifts in (3) gift baskets. They were well received and the recipients loved the salmon. Can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: DML718

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I sent salmon to several people at Christmas and everyone loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Crafter

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift to a friend and she was very happy with
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a friend and she was very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Dumbeau

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff
customer_reviews.text: Really good salmon and variety. Too much packaging for the contents. But rhyey made nice gifts. I will gladly buy this again
customer_reviews.author: satyanam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well, was a gift so I haven’t heard anything negative!
customer_reviews.author: bonita hamilton

customer_reviews.title: NY Loves this.
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality! Neighbors were begging for more. Stop making it so tasty please.
customer_reviews.author: Ms CG

customer_reviews.title: A good gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I personally cannot stand fish, but have found this goes a long way as gifts for the people in my life who do like smoked salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but worth every penny. This is not cheap farm grown atlantic salmon that in my opinion is suited for cat food only. Its the finest Alaska has to offer and its nice that it can be stored without refrigeration until that special time that you wish to indulge.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Vile

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Great product. Great taste. I’ve purchased many times over the years. Best smoked salmon in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Drs. J.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't eat any but expect it was fine..
customer_reviews.text: Gave it as a gift. I didn't eat any but expect it was fine...it's hard to screw up Alaskan salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Red Dogg

customer_reviews.title: Its like canned tuna.  Not dry smoked
customer_reviews.text: This is like caned tuna. Not a dry smoke product. It is in a vacuum sealed bag with lots of stinky juice.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Sandell

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Smoked Salmon Lovers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as gift. Recipient loved it. Great gift for anyone who loves smoked salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good choice of three different versions of smoked salmon. Was a great Christmas treat for friends. Tasty!
customer_reviews.author: VGK

customer_reviews.title: Gross.  Tastes like canned salmon
customer_reviews.text: Dry and flavorless. I opened it within a week of delivery and while it's edible it's certainly not enjoyable. Like eating salmon flavored cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS TRIO! Great salmon, perfect size to eat if your feeling a little hungry. Sealed and fresh everytime I get it! Nothing like a little salmon, crackers & hot sauce!
customer_reviews.author: Contracted

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best salmon out there. I subscribe to get it every month.
customer_reviews.author: mojimick

customer_reviews.title: ... gift and it was reported to me to be excellent..
customer_reviews.text: I bought as a gift and it was reported to me to be excellent..
customer_reviews.author: Dok Snow

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly flaky, great flavor
customer_reviews.text: Every year I order some smoked salmon for my dad, and this has been, by far, the best yet. Not at all dry like some we have gotten. The trio gives you three types so you can see which you like better if you aren't sure. I will be ordering SeaBear again!
customer_reviews.author: Milena Plecha

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a x-mas present to my husband - we could both eat it all in one sitting!!
customer_reviews.author: Jody S. Mealing

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This salmon was excellent! It's a little pricey, but worth it when you're craving authentic smoked salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Good way to review the three types of salmon to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good way to review the three types of salmon to decide which one is your favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Used the coho in smoked salmon pate and received great praise for the flavor
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Used the coho in smoked salmon pate and received great praise for the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: M Lee

customer_reviews.title: Pacific Smoked Salmon
customer_reviews.text: SeaBear smoked salmon trio is the perfect way to enjoy smoked salmon as an appetizer. It has wonderful flavor, and three different varieties in the pack allow you to experience the flavor varience between species. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: R. WESTBROOK

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me father for a Christmas present and he really enjoyed it. I'd probably get it again
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Huey

customer_reviews.title: I can't decide which variety I like best so I'm forced to buy it again to ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not, or wasn't a fish eater. My daughter talked me into trying smoked salmon so I shopped Amazon and decided to try this product because its American made as opposed to some offerings from China. This product is delicious! I can't decide which variety I like best so I'm forced to buy it again to help with that decision. It is because of this smoked Salmon that I now eat Salmon 2-3 times a week. As my daughter said-"your heart thanks you". I'm not a Salmon expert. This Salmon tastes good and has good texture. That's the extent of my expertise, and exactly why I eat what I eat.
customer_reviews.author: MSFour

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Christmas gift for someone who is hard to buy for. Everyone loves salmon.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Maloney-Koke

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Since moving to the Northwest, we wanted gifts for friends and families that reflect our new lifestyle. The trio of smoked salmon is perfect. I keep some around for visitors also. It doesn't have to be refrigerated, the salmon is very good, and the 3 pack makes it great for a couple of visitors or open more than one box for a crowd. Put out some cream cheese, crackers and the fish and you are the best hostess in town. Be sure to pat the fish with paper towels before serving or it is very wet.
customer_reviews.author: gotta have good coffee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smoked fish!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever write reviews on items I've purchased on Amazon, but this product is the real deal! The smoked salmon is moist and delicious. You can actually taste the fish and not just salt. I would definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Brys

customer_reviews.title: Smoked Salmon Trio.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves the product. Excellent flavor. The box gives you recipes. We tried the pasta with smoked salmon. Deliscious. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smoked Salmon
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased as a gift for a friend who retired. He LOVED it! His exact wrods were: "Wow, Very nice. I wouldn't have purchased this for myself".
customer_reviews.author: Wally chase

customer_reviews.title: Good option, for a quick and tasty meal.
customer_reviews.text: A good tasting option for a sumptuous and nutritious meal, prepared quickly, On top, does not require refrigeration and lasts ready to eat, for a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: Mousa99

customer_reviews.title: Easy Salmon Dinner
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful addition to my diet, easy to prepare and very good!
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Delicious tasting salmon
customer_reviews.text: Very small packages of salmon, but flavor is wonderful. I used it with cream cheese on bagel and taste was excellent. Better than a can of salmon with bones in it.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN QUIRAM

customer_reviews.title: Quality, delicious and consistent
customer_reviews.text: SeaBear makes the BEST salmon products on the market! Always good quality, year after year.
customer_reviews.author: RyanC

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered hoping to add a little taste of Seattle to a trip to Austin. Canned tuna tastes better than this product, and the texture is about the same.
customer_reviews.author: yrwehere

customer_reviews.title: Cost
customer_reviews.text: Product was used a gift and was greatly appreciated by the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: David A Katche

customer_reviews.title: SeaBear Salmon
customer_reviews.text: have had SeaBear Salmon before and good quality and good price
customer_reviews.author: Tutu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff. Can't get enough. Love with cheese and crackers.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: enjoyed the salmon as always, it is just expensive for that amount of product. Close to $40 a pound.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H.

customer_reviews.title: MMMmmm SO GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: Love the Smoked salmon Trio, Great flavor, perfect sizes to snack on! Go well with Crackers or just on its own!
customer_reviews.author: Contracted

customer_reviews.title: Awesome taste
customer_reviews.text: Probably the Best Brand of Smoked Salmon I ever had. really enjoyed the taste and freshness of the fish. You wont be disappointed in this brand for sure.
customer_reviews.author: J. Swim

customer_reviews.title: YTC
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting salmon trio. The only reason why I gave it four-stars is because it was slightly salty for my taste. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: YTC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really good Salmon. order it every year for my sister for Christmas and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Pops87

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I love Salmon and this is among ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I love Salmon and this is among the best I have found.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: I order these year after year.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for gift during the holidays and for entertaining. Good quality! The trio box provides three good choices.
customer_reviews.author: GNB

customer_reviews.title: Smoking good
customer_reviews.text: The salmon is excellent. The portions are a little small and definitely pricey but my husband and I love and order it every year.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: my parents loved it
customer_reviews.text: What else do I need to say - it was a gift for my father and both he and my mother loved it. I will be ordering it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: This sample pack was great! I ordered it for my finance as a valentines gift, and he was very pleased. The steaks were large and thick and the flavor was excellent. The box came quickly as advertised and we will be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A delicious treat, especially as a summer meal with a salad.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Monday

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents and they loved it. Great choice.
customer_reviews.author: SCP

customer_reviews.title: Was a Gift To A Helping Hand
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a friend who a week later was hit by Hurricane Harvey, after the dust had settled and he was back on the net, he and his wife enjoyed the SeaBear Smoked Salmon. That settled it for me, my friend also helped those in my small town and for that I’ll be sending him more SeaBear.
customer_reviews.author: Nomadic Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Was disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Holiday gift. The recipient called me and told me not to purchase this item in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect texture and very good taste. One star removed for price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment
customer_reviews.text: This trio was a perfect size for appetizers, the price was decent as well.
customer_reviews.author: ForMeToKnow

customer_reviews.title: A healthy luxury . . .
customer_reviews.text: You get a variety of different salmon and they are all excellent . . . You just can't beat the texture & the flavor
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Quality salmon, enjoy the trio of fish.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect snack for movie night. We enjoy the three types of salmon, each with its own unique texture and flavor qualities. We've ordered several boxes (and received them from my son in Washington initially), and we are always happy with the quality. It isn't a massive amount of salmon, but the quality is very good. Smoke quality is very good, never disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my father and his family(big fish fans) for christmas they thoroughly enjoyed it. Shipped out quick during the holiday season and got there in time. Def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JGrinch14

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Smoked Salmon!!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that this completely met my expectations of a good smoked salmon filet! A few words to describe what you are buying: 1. Three filets of different types of salmon 2. Fully cooked fish, clearly smoked (to me a medium level) 3. Firm and flakey. I didn't notice an overwhelming amount of oil/fat. 4. Skin on the filet. To me this is not a problem. 5. Each filet comes in a sealed foil pouch. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: An honest American

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: All three were really tasty. They are thick pieces of salmon and not the very thin sliced. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Nice as smoked salmon goes.
customer_reviews.text: Yummy smoked salmon. Vacuum sealed - it's not extremely dry, but not really moist either... quite a pricey way of eating salmon compared to pan fried fresh salmon which is possibly more delicious. I think salmon is probably more delicious as sushi than smoked too... so I can only really give it 4 stars. :)
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great present!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful company with a great product.Would recommend for others.My husband loves salmon and this was a great present.Great taste.Great variety.
customer_reviews.author: donald cooke

product_meta.title: SeaBear - Smoked Salmon Trio - 18oz Box
product_meta.description: Size:18 Ounce (Pack of 1)Wild salmon from the pristine icy cold waters of the Pacific Northwest.
feature_bullets: The Trio offers 3 individually boxed portions, each containing 6 oz smoked salmon (18 oz total)
Each fillet is filled by hand, small-batch smoked, vacuum sealed in our famous gold pouch and gently cooked
One 6 oz box of each: Wild Smoked Sockeye, Wild Smoked Coho, and Wild Smoked Pink Salmon
SeaBear gift boxes are great for hostess gifts, Father's Day presents and gourmet appetizers for entertaining
No refrigeration required until opened, Kosher certified
